extends com.google.protobuf.MessageOrBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • getMiddlewareName

        java.lang.String getMiddlewareName()
        The name of the middleware to register. The name should be as informative
as possible and is logged on registration.
        string middleware_name = 1;
        Returns:
        The middlewareName.

      • getMiddlewareNameBytes

        com.google.protobuf.ByteString getMiddlewareNameBytes()
        The name of the middleware to register. The name should be as informative
as possible and is logged on registration.
        string middleware_name = 1;
        Returns:
        The bytes for middlewareName.

      • getCustomMacaroonCaveatName

        java.lang.String getCustomMacaroonCaveatName()
        The name of the custom macaroon caveat that this middleware is responsible
for. Only requests/responses that contain a macaroon with the registered
custom caveat are forwarded for interception to the middleware. The
exception being the read-only mode: All requests/responses are forwarded to
a middleware that requests read-only access but such a middleware won't be
allowed to _alter_ responses. As a security measure, _no_ middleware can
change responses to requests made with _unencumbered_ macaroons!
NOTE: Cannot be used at the same time as read_only_mode.
        string custom_macaroon_caveat_name = 2;
        Returns:
        The customMacaroonCaveatName.

      • getCustomMacaroonCaveatNameBytes

        com.google.protobuf.ByteString getCustomMacaroonCaveatNameBytes()
        The name of the custom macaroon caveat that this middleware is responsible
for. Only requests/responses that contain a macaroon with the registered
custom caveat are forwarded for interception to the middleware. The
exception being the read-only mode: All requests/responses are forwarded to
a middleware that requests read-only access but such a middleware won't be
allowed to _alter_ responses. As a security measure, _no_ middleware can
change responses to requests made with _unencumbered_ macaroons!
NOTE: Cannot be used at the same time as read_only_mode.
        string custom_macaroon_caveat_name = 2;
        Returns:
        The bytes for customMacaroonCaveatName.

      • getReadOnlyMode

        boolean getReadOnlyMode()
        Instead of defining a custom macaroon caveat name a middleware can register
itself for read-only access only. In that mode all requests/responses are
forwarded to the middleware but the middleware isn't allowed to alter any of
the responses.
NOTE: Cannot be used at the same time as custom_macaroon_caveat_name.
        bool read_only_mode = 3;
        Returns:
        The readOnlyMode.
